posts.title: Liquid Grip
posts.content:
Get a Grip!

Click for more information about Liquid Grips!

I wish I had these when I was a gymnast! I would have enjoyed the uneven bars so much more!

Liquid Grip is a liquid gripping agent. It’s much better than chalk because it’s

  • not messy
  • stays on
  • dry grip
  • prevents blisters
  • heat & sweat activated

Great for weight lifting, gymnastics, pole dancing, rock climbing, baseball and more! One application will last for your entire training session. Don’t worry, it won’t get on your clothes or on your equipment. Wash it off your hands with soap and water.

Get your Grips!

Liquid Grips are available NOW at Bodybuilding.com! Click HERE to get yours!

Click for more information about Liquid Grips!

posts.title: Quest Nutrition’s Protein Peanut Butter Cups
posts.title_plain: Quest Nutrition’s Protein Peanut Butter Cups
posts.content:
25% OFF at Bodybuilding.com!

REJOICE because Quest Nutrition’s Protein Peanut Butter Cups are officially ON SALE at Bodybuilding.com for 25% OFF! Or buy a box of 12 for 16% OFF!

These little bad boys taste like candy – except they aren’t! Unlike candy, which is high in sugar and low in protein, Quest’s Peanut Butter Cups are the exact opposite!

So have a daily Quest Cravings Protein Peanut Butter Cup without compromising your fat loss, muscle gain or healthy lifestyle goals!

  • 20g protein
  • no soy protein
  • gluten free
  • low carb – only 4 g NET CARBS (from nuts, not sugar!) Perfect for diabetics & dieters.
  • no sugar used

Enter the FREE GIVEAWAY below for your chance to win a box of Quest Cravings Protein Peanut Butter Cups, courtesy of DrSaraSolomon.com and Bodybuilding.com!

Product Information:

Enter the Free Giveaway! CONTEST CLOSED!

Thank you to everyone who participated! I loved the captions!

Please check my website regularly for more contests!

Win a box of Quest Cravings Protein Peanut Butter Cups, courtesy of DrSaraSolomon.com and Bodybuilding.com!

BEST PHOTO CAPTION: Take a look at my photo. I’m a peanut butter cup monster! Enter by writing a clever photo caption in the comments section below. Make sure you mention Quest Cravings Protein Peanut Butter Cups in your caption!

  • Best photo caption wins!
  • Contest is global (Bodybuilding.com ships all over the world!)
  • Contest runs from Thursday April 25, 2013 until midnight EST Saturday April 27, 2013.
  • I will email the winner and post the winner’s name right here: Tim Borland: “Quest Cravings Protein Peanut Buter Cups are just the thing when you are craving something sweet to eat and live the Bodybuilding.com lifestyle…eye candy for sure!”
  • Winner will receive a box containing 12 packages of Quest Protein Peanut Butter Cups in the mail (that’s 24 PB cups), shipped from Bodybuilding.com!
  • Good Luck!

Also Recommended:

Try my Recipe for Quest Peanut Butter Cup Fluff

  1. Quest Nutrition Bars!  These are ridiculously good! I confess I eat one a day! (except when I eat 2 a day! shhhh!)
  2. My Lo Han Guo article (this natural sweetener is featured in Quest Products)
  3. My recipe for Quest Peanut Butter Cup Fluff!

Click to Buy Now from Bodybuilding.com

posts.title: Quest Nutrition Bars
posts.content:
Quest bars have one of the best nutritional profiles of any protein bar on the market!

  • Gluten free
  • 20 g high protein
  • 4 g non-fiber carbs (learn more about non-fiber carbs by reading my article, “Fiber Facts and Net Carbs“)
  • No trans fat
  • Diabetic-friendly

What are my Favourite Quest Nutrition Bars?

  • Chocolate Brownie, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and Chocolate Peanut Butter:  I heat these in the microwave for 15 seconds to create a warm gooey BROWNIE!
  • Coconut Cashew: I heat it in the microwave for 15 seconds to create a warm gooey COOKIE!
  • Apple Pie: I heat it in the microwave for 15 seconds to make WARM APPLE PIE!
  • Banana Nut Muffin: I also heat this in the microwave for 15 seconds to make warm banana bread!
  • Strawberry Cheesecake, White Chocolate Raspberry  &  Lemon Cream Pie: I like these at room temperature.

Quest Protein Peanut Butter Cups! 

Only 4 g active carbs, no sugar used, 20 g of protein

Watch my Video Quest Taste Test!

Watch my Quest Video Sequel (I think it’s better than the original)

posts.title: Guilt-Free Peanut Butter!
posts.content:
It’s no secret that peanut butter is high in fat calories.  If you are a peanut butter addict (like Sara is) and have a hard time exercising portion control, then PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter is for you!

  • PB2 has the same consistency and taste as full fat peanut butter, minus the guilt!
  • PB2 has nearly 85% less fat calories than conventional peanut butter!
  • PB2 is made with high quality peanuts that are slow-roasted and pressed to remove the oil.
  • PB2 is all natural with no artificial flavours, sweeteners, or preservatives.
  • PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter is mixed with water to create a traditional peanut butter mixture.
  • PB2 can be used as a substitute for peanut butter in recipes.

Ingredients: Roasted Peanuts, salt, and sugar.

PB2 Nutritional Information: 2 TBSP:  45 calories, 1.5 g of fat, 94 mg sodium, 5 g of carbohydrates, 2 g of fiber, 1 g of sugar and 5 g of protein.

Chocolate PB2 Nutritional Information: 2 TBSP: 45 calories, 1 g of fat, 70 mg sodium, 6 g of carbohydrates, 1 g of fiber, 3 g of sugar and 5 g of protein.

Compare these values to 2 TBSP of all-natural peanut butter:  180 calories, 16 g fat, 0 mg sodium, 6 g carbohydrates, 2 g fiber, 2 g of sugar and 8 g of protein.  NO CONTEST!

Click to purchase (Canadian Shoppers):

Click here to purchase (American Shoppers):

 

amazon.com

posts.title: Zero Calorie Pasta!
posts.content:
Dr. Sara Solomon uses Miracle Noodles and Miracle Rice in many of her healthy recipes featured on drsarasolomon.com, such as:

  • Chocolate Miracle Rice Pudding
  • Zero Calorie Tomato Risotto

Information about Miracle Noodles and Miracle Rice:

  • calorie free
  • carbohydrate free
  • gluten free & wheat free
  • kosher
  • made of a healthy natural soluble fiber called Glucomannan
  • beneficial effects backed by medical studies for type II diabetes, constipation, obesity and cholesterol
  • easily absorbs the flavours of any soup, dish or sauce
  • no fat, no sugar, no starch
  • are instant and come in a variety of styles
  • eat them to stay thin!
